title.narrative: New - United Kingdom National Commission for the United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organisation

description.narrative: This activity (New - United Kingdom National Commission for the United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organisation ) is a component of United Kingdom National Commission for the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £298,970. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Multisector aid, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO). The start date is 21-07-2020 and the end date is 31-12-2021.
